name: Angry larry run
description:
Guyes there is a small bug after downloading the game when you play yor gonna see that the player is invisible just go to the shop in the game and equip the normal skin and than every thing go back to normal also it saves and you dont need to do it again only the first time and thanks for playing.

this game is about having fun with fast based action going on, you are a character called Larry and his always angry and you control this character to avoid holes that have types (ice, fire, etc ...), and also collect coins to buy customs for larry, and try also achieving best score you can.
